name: PM-KISAN Samman Nidhi
description: Income support of ₹6,000 per year to eligible farmers through Direct Benefit Transfer.
apply_steps: Apply online on the PM-KISAN portal or at CSC

name: MGNREGA
description: Provides up to 100 days of paid manual work annually for rural households.
eligibility: Must live in a rural area

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
description: Affordable housing support with credit-linked subsidy for low and moderate income groups.
eligibility: Does not own a pucca house
Belongs to EWS / LIG / MIG income group
apply_steps: Apply online or local authority portal

name: Ayushman Bharat – PMJAY
description: National health insurance providing up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for hospitalisation.
apply_steps: Check eligibility at authorized center or online
Get cashless treatment at empaneled hospitals

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
description: Financial inclusion scheme ensuring access to banking services for all households.
apply_steps: Visit bank branch or Bank Mitra outlet

name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY)
description: Life insurance scheme for people aged 18-50 with low premium.
apply_steps: Claim paid to nominee on event

name: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY)
description: Accident insurance providing coverage for accidental death and disability.
apply_steps: Claim via bank/policy if accident occurs

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: Provides free LPG connections to women of BPL households.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme
description: Provides monthly pension to senior citizens below poverty line families.

name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
description: Pension scheme for unorganized sector workers with guaranteed monthly pension.
